title: Update Customer Address
description: A retail banking customer has moved and needs to update their mailing address.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer using two-factor authentication.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully verifies the customer's identity.

tasks.description: Collect the new address from the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the new mailing address.

tasks.description: Update the customer's address in the core banking system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the address and confirms the change.
